full_summary:
# Review, Refine, and Incorporate DFO-Recommended Improvements to FAST Fish Passage Assessment Tool
## Title: [FR] Examiner, perfectionner et intégrer les améliorations recommandées par Pêches et Océans Canada concernant l’outil d’évaluation du passage du poisson FAST / [ENG] Review, Refine and Incorporate DFO-Recommended Improvements to FAST Fish Passage Assessment Tool
### Reference Number [FR] #cb-6772-70981557 / [ENG] #30003613
### Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-13

## Background
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) seeks to further develop and refine a fish passage assessment support tool (FAST) for the Fish and Fish Habitat Protection Program. This project aims to incorporate biologists' reviews and recommendations from the DFO.

## Objectives

* Prepare, update, and automate the tool into an app
* Finalize the tool and associated documentation

## Expected Deliverables

* Developing tool and supporting documentation revisions
* field testing and verification of accuracy and efficacy
* engagement with key provincial partners/CWF
* participating/facilitating in DFO review process for the tool
* developing an app
* finalizing the app and reporting on deliverables

## Contract Information

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-07-21
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-03-31
* Trade Agreements: [GBTAG {CKFTA}, CFTA]
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Edmonton, Burlington

## Contact Information

* Name: Cal LaKing
* Email: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: 506-478-3581

You can obtain additional information by attaching documents from this link: [AKA][ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6772/30003613---acan.pdf or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6772/30003613---acan_fr.pdf ](/eng and /fr)

This is an Advanced Contract Award Notice. Sign in to Canadabuys to find more details.
